tool_description: Calculates giving capacity scores based on wealth indicators, past giving history, and standard philanthropic capacity formulas used in major gift fundraising.

estimated_net_worth.description: Estimated net worth of prospect in USD

past_largest_gift.description: Largest documented charitable gift in USD

annual_giving_total.description: Total annual charitable giving in USD

age.description: Prospect age for lifecycle giving calculations

error_messages: Invalid net worth: Net worth must be a positive number greater than $100,000.
Invalid income: Annual income must be a positive number.
Age out of range: If provided, age must be between 25 and 100.
Inconsistent financial data: Past giving appears disproportionate to reported wealth levels.
usage: Provide estimated_net_worth and annual_income to calculate basic capacity. Include past_largest_gift, annual_giving_total, and age for more accurate capacity estimates.

capacity_rating.description: Capacity rating category: low, moderate, high, or major

suggested_ask_amount.description: Recommended initial ask amount in USD

annual_capacity.description: Estimated annual giving capacity in USD

major_gift_capacity.description: Estimated capacity for one-time major gift in USD

confidence_level.description: Confidence in capacity calculation: low, medium, or high
